data.name: Datenschutz_Bei_Fragen_oder_Anliegen_zum_Datenschutz_kannst_
data.value: If you have any questions or concerns regarding data protection, please contact the address listed in the imprint.

data.name: Datenschutz_Beim_Besuch_dieser_Website_werden_lediglich_die_
data.value: When visiting this website, only technically necessary data (IP address, browser type, time) are processed. These are used solely to ensure proper operation and are not merged with other data sources.

data.name: Datenschutz_Dein_Spotify_Benutzername_und_deine_ffentliche_N
data.value: Your Spotify username and your public user ID

data.name: Datenschutz_Die_Daten_werden_ausschlie_lich_verwendet_um_Spo
data.value: The data are used exclusively to generate Spotify playlists for you. No permanent storage, analysis, or transfer to third parties takes place. After the session ends, no personal data are stored on the server.

data.name: Datenschutz_Diese_App_steht_in_keiner_offiziellen_Verbindung
data.value: This app is not officially affiliated with Spotify AB. Spotify is a registered trademark of Spotify AB, Stockholm, Sweden.

data.name: Datenschutz_Diese_Website_kann_optional_Google_Analytics_4_v
data.value: This website may optionally use Google Analytics 4. IP addresses are anonymized before being sent to Google servers (IP anonymization). The data are used only for statistical analysis. You can disable collection in your browser settings.

data.name: Datenschutz_Du_hast_gem_Art_15_ff_DSGVO_jederzeit_das_Recht_
data.value: In accordance with Art. 15 et seq. GDPR, you have the right at any time to access, rectify, delete, restrict processing, and request data portability of your personal data.

data.name: Datenschutz_Du_kannst_den_Zugriff_jederzeit_ber_dein
data.value: You can revoke access at any time via your

data.name: Datenschutz_Empfohlene_Songs_die_Spotify_anhand_deiner_H_rge
data.value: Recommended songs generated by Spotify based on your listening habits

data.name: Datenschutz_Es_werden_keine_Cookies_keine_Tracking_Tools_und
data.value: No cookies, tracking tools, or external analytics services are used. The application uses only the Spotify Web API. All tokens are deleted after the session ends.

data.name: Datenschutz_F_r_freiwillige_Spenden_wird_der_Dienst_PayPal_g
data.value: For voluntary donations, the PayPal service is used (PayPal (Europe) S.à r.l. et Cie, S.C.A., Luxembourg). When clicking on the donation link or QR code, you are redirected to the PayPal website. PayPal’s privacy policy applies:

data.name: Datenschutz_Verantwortlich_f_r_den_Betrieb_dieser_Anwendung_
data.value: The operator of the domain is responsible for running this application

data.name: Datenschutz_Verantwortlich_im_Sinne_der_Datenschutzgesetze
data.value: Responsible within the meaning of data protection laws:

data.name: Datenschutz_Wof_r_werden_die_Daten_genutzt
data.value: For what are the data used?

data.name: Datenschutz_um_personalisierte_Playlists_zu_erstellen_Dabei_
data.value: to create personalized playlists. Your Spotify account is temporarily connected to access your favorite songs and artists.

data.name: Impressum_Angaben_gem_5_TMG_18_Abs_2_MStV
data.value: Information according to §5 TMG & §18 para. 2 MStV:

data.name: Impressum_Die_Inhalte_unserer_Seiten_wurden_mit_gr_ter_Sor
data.value: The contents of our pages have been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the content. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with Section 7 (1) of the German Telemedia Act (TMG) under general law.

data.name: Impressum_Die_durch_die_Seitenbetreiber_erstellten_Inhalte
data.value: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Third-party contributions are marked as such. Duplication, processing, distribution, or any form of use beyond the scope of copyright law requires the written consent of the respective author or creator.

data.name: Impressum_Unser_Angebot_enth_lt_Links_zu_externen_Websites
data.value: Our offer contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no control. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is always responsible for the content of those pages.

data.name: Index_Nach_dem_Login_mit_deinem_Spotify_Konto_greift_d
data.value: After logging in with your Spotify account, the app securely accesses your listening data via the Spotify Web API and automatically creates playlists according to your choice. You can decide whether to save your most listened songs, your saved favorites, or recommended tracks in a new order.
